name: DinoScore
description:
You've been selected by a secret agency to bring an ancient dinosaur egg back to life. Made in ~ 10 hours for the Jame Gam: Easter Edition (4/14/22 - 4/18/22)

Theme: Resurrection        Special Object: Egg

More features/cutscenes to be added after the voting period ends!

Credits:

Design, Programming, Sound Effects, Some Art: me

Music: Jim Hall - freemusicarchive.org

Scientist character: davidaf3 - OpenGameArt.org

Tileset: Got in a Humble Bundle a while back
